name: Sweet Pea & Robyte's Hunger
description:
The main menu song made by me using Sonic Pi (Ruby based language to make music)

Fonts used: Poor Richard (Inkscape)

Level One: Collect 10 peace coins. (it will change levels after 3 second)

Level Two: Talk to your corn friend Cobbs, defeat Robyte and get your baby peas to the far right platform together.


KNOWN BUGS

  • Boss does not chasing you after damaged arm state (while corn friend is shown)
  • Player bounces off enemies heads at different forces
  • Sound FX not perfect just place holders really :)
  • If you have more than 10 peace coins on level one it won't switch (happens when you bounce on the enemy and collecting the coins skipping the exactly 10 mark)
  • The whole Boss has a lot of bugs... the list is long (animation, not attacking when you are first let go and stand still)
  • UI on full screen is not setup right
  • Press E vanishes too fast at first
